original_title: Honningsvågrevyen: Sprer seg som ild i tørt hår
overview: The fifth show with Honningsvågrevyen. Here you'll meet a lot of suspicious characters. What do we get if we connect a healer from Lenangen, a sami medical secretary and two feminine fishermen that's veeeeeery close friends? And add Fillip from Bø, Arnt Hjalmar from Mehamn and a bearded lady on the hunt for oil workers from Hammerfest? A show with madness and raw humor - from the northernmost part of Norway.
title: Honningsvågrevyen: Sprer seg som ild i tørt hår
